comment.author: 28851656@N04
comment._content: I have an original watercolour painting of RMS Orvieto that has been in the family a long time, and have taken an interest in her for years. Always keen to find more photos of her! They don't build ships like this any more.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sunglintphotos] They certainly are classic vessels aren't they! ORVIETO is an impressive example, perfect subject for a painting :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
